boggle.title: b!boggle
boggle.description: Use to start a game. Any other words will be taken as parameters.

time.title: 2m, 3m, 30s
time.description: Sets he game time to 2 minutes, 3 minutes, or 30 seconds. Defaults to 1 minute.

showwords.title: showwords / words
showwords.description: Shows everyone's valid words at the end. Defaults to not show words.

team.title: team
team.description: Earned points are shared between all players. Defaults to everyone having their own scores.

size.description: Sets the width / height of the board to be inputted number. Defaults to 4.

plurals.title: plurals
plurals.description: Inputting words with -s or -ed will automatically attempt to add the base word. Example: bases will input bases and base.

possible.title: possible
possible.description: Shows a list of all possible words at the end.
